Want to help build and improve our website? We're looking for developers, designers, writers, and community members to collaborate on this open project!

ğŸ¨ How You Can Contribute

For Developers

  • Improve existing features and functionality
  • Add new interactive elements
  • Fix bugs and optimize performance
  • Review code and suggest improvements
  • Help with responsive design and accessibility

For Content Creators

  • Write blog posts about Flamingalo experiences

For Designers

  • Enhance visual consistency
  • Work on branding elements

For Everyone

  • Report bugs and issues you find
  • Suggest new features and improvements
  • Test the website on different devices
  • Share feedback from the community
  • Help organize content and information

ğŸš€ Our Tech Stack

The Flamingalo website is built with modern, performant technologies:

  • Astro 5 - Lightning-fast static site generation
  • React 19 - Interactive UI components
  • TypeScript - Type-safe development
  • Tailwind CSS 4 - Modern styling
  • Markdown - Easy content creation for blog posts

Donâ€™t worry if youâ€™re not familiar with all of these - weâ€™re here to help you learn!

ğŸŒŸ Why Contribute?

Itâ€™s a Co-Created Event

Flamingalo is built by the community, for the community. The website is no different! This is your chance to be part of something bigger and help shape the digital home of our amazing event.

Learn and Grow

Working on an open project like this is a fantastic way to:

  • Learn new technologies
  • Collaborate with talented people
  • Build your portfolio
  • Make real impact

Embody the 10 Principles

Contributing to the website embodies several of the Burning Man principles:

  • Participation - Be part of creating, not just consuming
  • Communal Effort - Work together to build something amazing
  • Gifting - Share your skills and time with the community
  • Civic Responsibility - Help maintain our digital infrastructure

ğŸ¤ Collaboration Spirit
